name: Trellion & Sniff - Die Squirrel Die
description:
Trellion and sniff back with the second installment - 'Die Squirrel Die' - 12 track album available on CD Format and digital download from the 5th November. The album features an array of ill beat makers including the likes of; Marshall Artist, (deadbeat productions) Reklews, (blah records) Darkstorm, Miggy Manacles kidlib and Medison. Guest MC appearances from Figment and TK-1. Buy this album please its kinda nice and keep checking Bad Taste website for info on upcoming releases from the whole crew.
